Part 4 Roost and nest sites The following map shows the locations where birds spend the night. IMPORTANT Roost = A bird temporarily spending a night at a location but moving frequently Potential nest = A bird returning to the same location through time (across multiple days and weeks) 4.0.1 Nighttime roost movement summary If a birds night-time roost is does not change then the average roost spacing will be very low (<0.5 km - green rows). We should also look at the data where the average roost spacing is <1km (orange rows). All other rows are white: 4.0.1.1 Costa Rica name roost_spacing_km Messi 1.0 Clifford 2.0 Sherekhan 2.0 Dizzy 2.4 Dustin 2.6 Frosty 3.3 Ziggy 3.8 Elvis 4.1 Flaps 4.6 Tupac 4.7 Sonqoy 5.0 Siegfried 6.7 Buzzie 6.9 Pedro 7.2 Rocky 7.3 Robinhood 7.8 Fossey 9.4 Elizabeth 9.9 Charles 10.0 Illari 10.0 Moskovits 10.3 Nekhbet 10.4 Kingkong 10.9 Bonnie 11.9 Spazzino 12.3 Wenceslas 12.7 Steve 12.9 Mufasa 13.0 Charizard 14.9 Jatayu 16.3 Carolina 19.6 You can see the distribution of the nightime locations with the following map.
